text: Today on the West Coast, it's looking fun with 5 ft @12s WNW swell and a fresh 14 mph E wind. Ardnave Bay and Saligo Bay are your best bets, with clean conditions early. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 3 ft @10s, still offering some playful waves at the same spots. By the day after, expect 2 ft @10s, making for a mellow session. Best: today.
